name: LAK
tagline: THIRTY SEVEN YEARS SERVING SAN DIEGO & BEYOND.
description: LAK Advertising is a full service ad agency and integrated marketing communications company. Together with sister company VDP Direct, we are a one stop shop that includes strategy, branding, planning, design, offset and variable data printing, bindery, data, and mailing services. From start-ups to mega-corporations, LAK Advertising has the versatility, expertise and strategic thinking to build your brand and generate timely, efficient and profitable results.
